name: NLTK (Natural Language Toolkit)
features: Interfaces to Corpora and Lexical Resources (WordNet, etc.)

pricing.model: Free and open-source library. No licensing costs.

pros: Extensive collection of corpora and lexical resources
Comprehensive set of text processing tools
Suitable for linguists, engineers, students, educators, researchers, and industry users
Well-documented with a practical introduction to programming for language processing
cons: May require more coding compared to some commercial NLP services
Performance may not be as optimized as some commercial libraries for large-scale tasks

user_reviews.summary: Requires further research from external review sites (e.g., G2, Capterra).

scalability: Scalability depends on the specific implementation and hardware
